Hi Steve,
          I am using Heritrix 3.1.1. I am running it under Linux.=

Maybe the way I am using it could cause an issue. I run a job and then
del=
ete the job from the directory and move it to another location. Then
when I=
 need to perform the job again I copy it back.
Is this known to cause any i=
ssue?
Is there a clean way of deleting a job in Heritrix 3?
I am operating =
it using scripts and issuing commands through curl.

Thanks,Sriram
